vsParam:
Uh...? Is that... Trum...?
Hmm. Here's the thing...

Trum...? That monster...
I think it said Green Lily...

Ah ah... In short,
that monster is... one of my old friends.

What...!? That thing is a monster...
although it looks like a mermaid...!?

... Yes.
Actually, some mermaids once were reduced to monsters.

Mermaids have rich emotions.
It's a race that is easily touched by various sorts of things.

But, if we lose hope in this world...
Our hearts would wither sometimes.

If that happens... mermaids would turn into monsters.
And their souls would be eroded.

...! Perhaps this is the "nourishment of mind"
you mentioned, Amaryllis...

Yes.
The countermeasure to prevent the mind from withering...

That kid...
He must have lived an unhappy life.

He probably got separated from his family...
If I have no friends...

... Hmm. We should probably get back. The monster has
been taken care of. We don't need to stay here any longer.
